slide.title: Rendering PDF pages
slide.blurb: PDFLib supports a wide variety of functions for drawing geometric shapes within a given page include arc lengths, lines, and general polygons. All drawing in PDFLib is done via a three-step process:

list.bullet: Move the cursor to the start location (%pdf_moveto()%)
Render (or "stroke") the drawing to the page (%pdf_stroke()%)
